Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: Project Summary: React Leaflet Map Integration This project showcases the integration of Leaflet, a versatile open-source mapping library, into both plain HTML/CSS/JavaScript applications and React applications. It provides a lightweight and customizable alternative to Google Maps, allowing developers to easily implement interactive maps.
items.title: kuntalkumar/map-clustering: Project Summary: React Leaflet Map Integration This project showcases the integration of Leaflet, a versatile open-source mapping library, into both plain HTML/CSS/JavaScript applications and React applications. It provides a lightweight and customizable alternative to Google Maps, allowing developers to easily implement interactive maps.

items.content_html: A lightweight and performant logging module for Node.js applications, available as an NPM package. It supports console and file logging with multiple levels and colors, and includes additional features such as memory usage tracking, caller information, and configurable output formats.
items.title: samestrin/advanced-console-log: A lightweight and performant logging module for Node.js applications, available as an NPM package. It supports console and file logging with multiple levels and colors, and includes additional features such as memory usage tracking, caller information, and configurable output formats.
